item.title: Why "Fuck the System?"
item.description: The motto of this blog is “Fuck the system.” Why? Because, frankly, I’m an extremely cynical person. Then again, who wouldn’t be in a world that’s burning around them? In this article, I’ll explain most of the issues I have with the world as a whole, why we live in a predystopian society, and why we will soon witness systemic collapse. 1. Education ðŸ”—If you’ve read my about page, you know how big of an issue this is for me.
